SQL.LOAD: SELECT transaction_log_header_id, item_number, response, response_detail, xml_service_center_code, xml_description, xml_tax_id, xml_status_code, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, trans_dtl_service_center_id FROM elp_trans_dtl_service_center WHERE trans_dtl_service_center_id = :trans_dtl_service_center_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_trans_dtl_service_center SET transaction_log_header_id = :transaction_log_header_id, item_number = :item_number, response = :response, response_detail = :response_detail, xml_service_center_code = :xml_service_center_code, xml_description = :xml_description, xml_tax_id = :xml_tax_id, xml_status_code = :xml_status_code, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE trans_dtl_service_center_id = :trans_dtl_service_center_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_trans_dtl_service_center ( transaction_log_header_id, item_number, response, response_detail, xml_service_center_code, xml_description, xml_tax_id, xml_status_code, created_by, trans_dtl_service_center_id ) VALUES ( :transaction_log_header_id, :item_number, :response, :response_detail, :xml_service_center_code, :xml_description, :xml_tax_id, :xml_status_code, :created_by, :trans_dtl_service_center_id )
